aide.title: SV-258134: RHEL 9 must have the AIDE package installed.

notify.title: SV-258135: RHEL 9 must routinely check the baseline configuration for unauthorized changes and notify the system administrator when anomalies in the operation of any security functions are discovered.
notify.value: /usr/sbin/aide --check | /bin/mail -s "$HOSTNAME - Daily aide integrity check run" root@sysname.mil

acl.title: SV-258138: RHEL 9 must be configured so that the file integrity tool verifies Access Control Lists (ACLs).

active.title: SV-258145: RHEL 9 must be configured to offload audit records onto a different system from the system being audited via syslog.

disk_error_action.title: SV-258153: RHEL 9 audit system must take appropriate action when an error writing to the audit storage volume occurs.

disk_full_action.title: SV-258154: RHEL 9 audit system must take appropriate action when the audit storage volume is full.

space_left.title: SV-258155: RHEL 9 must allocate audit record storage capacity to store at least one weeks worth of audit records.

space_left_action.title: SV-258157: RHEL 9 must notify the system administrator (SA) and information system security officer (ISSO) (at a minimum) when allocated audit record storage volume 75 percent utilization.

admin_space_left.title: SV-258158: RHEL 9 must take action when allocated audit record storage volume reaches 95 percent of the audit record storage capacity.

admin_space_left_action.title: SV-258159: RHEL 9 must take action when allocated audit record storage volume reaches 95 percent of the repository maximum audit record storage capacity.

name_format.title: SV-258161: RHEL 9 must label all offloaded audit logs before sending them to the central log server

freq.title: SV-258168: RHEL 9 must periodically flush audit records to disk to prevent the loss of audit records.

audispd-plugins.title: SV-258175: RHEL 9 audispd-plugins package must be installed.

execve.title: SV-258176: RHEL 9 must audit uses of the "execve" system call.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S execve -C uid!=euid -F euid=0 -k execpriv
-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S execve -C gid!=egid -F egid=0 -k execpriv

chmod.title: SV-258177: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the chmod, fchmod, and fchmodat system calls.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chmod,fchmod,fchmodat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_mod

chown.title: SV-258178: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the chown, fchown, fchownat, and lchown system calls.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chown,fchown,fchownat,lchown -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_mod

xattr.title: SV-258179: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the setxattr, fsetxattr, lsetxattr, removexattr, fremovexattr, and lremovexattr system calls.

umount.title: SV-258215: Successful/unsuccessful uses of the umount system call in RHEL 9 must generate an audit record.
umount.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/umount -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-mount
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S umount -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-umount

chacl.title: SV-258181: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the chacl command.
chacl.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/chacl -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_mod

setfacl.title: SV-258182: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the setfacl command.
setfacl.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/setfacl -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_mod

chcon.title: SV-258183: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the chcon command.
chcon.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/chcon -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_mod

semanage.title: SV-258184: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the semanage command.
semanage.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/semanage -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

setfiles.title: SV-258185: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the setfiles command.
setfiles.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/setfiles -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

setsebool.title: SV-258186: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the setsebool command.
setsebool.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/setsebool -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=privileged-unix-update

files.title: SV-258187: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the rename, unlink, rmdir, renameat, and unlinkat system calls.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S rename,unlink,rmdir,renameat,unlinkat -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k delete

file.title: SV-258188: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the truncate, ftruncate, creat, open, openat, and open_by_handle_at system calls.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S truncate,ftruncate,creat,open,openat,open_by_handle_at -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_access
-a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S truncate,ftruncate,creat,open,openat,open_by_handle_at -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_access

delete_module.title: SV-258189: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the delete_module system call.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S delete_module -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k module_chng

init_module.title: SV-258190: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the init_module and finit_module system calls.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S init_module,finit_module -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k module_chng

chage.title: SV-258191: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the chage command.
chage.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/chage -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-chage

chsh.title: SV-258192: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the chsh command.
chsh.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/chsh -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k priv_cmd

crontab.title: SV-258193: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the crontab command.
crontab.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/crontab -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-crontab

gpasswd.title: SV-258194: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the gpasswd command.
gpasswd.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/gpasswd -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-gpasswd

kmod.title: SV-258195: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the kmod command.
kmod.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/kmod -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k modules

newgrp.title: SV-258196: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the newgrp command.
newgrp.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/newgrp -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k priv_cmd

pam_timestamp_check.title: SV-258197: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the pam_timestamp_check command.
pam_timestamp_check.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/pam_timestamp_check -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-pam_timestamp_check

passwd_command.title: SV-258198: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the passwd command.
passwd_command.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/passwd -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-passwd

postdrop.title: SV-258199: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the postdrop command.
postdrop.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/postdrop -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

postqueue.title: SV-258200: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the postqueue command.
postqueue.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/postqueue -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

ssh-agent.title: SV-258201: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the ssh-agent command.
ssh-agent.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/ssh-agent -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-ssh

ssh-keysign.title: SV-258202: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the ssh-keysign command.
ssh-keysign.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/libexec/openssh/ssh-keysign -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-ssh

su.title: SV-258203: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the su command.
su.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/su -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-priv_change

sudo.title: SV-258204: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the sudo command.
sudo.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/sudo -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k priv_cmd

sudoedit.title: SV-258205: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the sudoedit command.
sudoedit.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/sudoedit -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k priv_cmd

unix_chkpwd.title: SV-258206: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the unix_chkpwd command.
unix_chkpwd.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/unix_chkpwd -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

unix_update.title: SV-258207: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the unix_update command.
unix_update.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/unix_update -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

userhelper.title: SV-258208: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the userhelper command.
userhelper.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/userhelper -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-unix-update

usermod.title: SV-258209: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the usermod command.
usermod.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/usermod -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-usermod

mount.title: SV-258210: RHEL 9 must audit all uses of the mount command.
mount.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/bin/mount -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-mount

init.title: SV-258211: Successful/unsuccessful uses of the init command in RHEL 9 must generate an audit record.
init.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/init -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-init

poweroff.title: SV-258212: Successful/unsuccessful uses of the poweroff command in RHEL 9 must generate an audit record.
poweroff.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/poweroff -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-poweroff

reboot.title: SV-258213: Successful/unsuccessful uses of the reboot command in RHEL 9 must generate an audit record.
reboot.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/reboot -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-reboot

shutdown.title: SV-258214: Successful/unsuccessful uses of the shutdown command in RHEL 9 must generate an audit record.
shutdown.rule: -a always,exit -F path=/usr/sbin/shutdown -F perm=x -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k privileged-shutdown

umount2.title: SV-258216: Successful/unsuccessful uses of the umount2 system call in RHEL 9 must generate an audit record.
rules: -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S umount2 -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -k perm_mod

sudoers.title: SV-258217: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/sudoers.

sudoers.d.title: SV-258218: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/sudoers.d/ directory.

group.title: SV-258219: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/group.

gshadow.title: SV-258220: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/gshadow.

opasswd.title: SV-258221: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/opasswd.

passwd.title: SV-258222: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/passwd.

shadow.title: SV-258223: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /etc/shadow.

faillock.title: SV-258224: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /var/log/faillock.

lastlog.title: SV-258225: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /var/log/lastlog.

tallylog.title: SV-258226: RHEL 9 must generate audit records for all account creations, modifications, disabling, and termination events that affect /var/log/tallylog.

critical.title: SV-258227: RHEL 9 must take appropriate action when a critical audit processing failure occurs.

loginuid.title: SV-258228: RHEL 9 audit system must protect logon UIDs from unauthorized change.

unauthorized.title: SV-258229: RHEL 9 audit system must protect auditing rules from unauthorized change.

boot_loader_superuser_password.title: SV-257787: RHEL 9 must require a boot loader superuser password.

boot_loader_superusers_name.title: SV-257789: RHEL 9 must require a unique superusers name upon booting into single-user and maintenance modes.

vsyscall.title: SV-257792: RHEL 9 must disable virtual system calls.

page_poison.title: SV-257793: RHEL 9 must clear the page allocator to prevent use-after-free attacks.

slub_debug.title: SV-257794: RHEL 9 must clear SLUB/SLAB objects to prevent use-after-free attacks.

pti.title: SV-257795: RHEL 9 must enable mitigations against processor-based vulnerabilities.

audit.title: SV-257796: RHEL 9 must enable auditing of processes that start prior to the audit daemon.

audit_backlog_limit.title: SV-258173: RHEL 9 must allocate an audit_backlog_limit of sufficient size to capture processes that start prior to the audit daemon.

fips.title: SV-258241: RHEL 9 must implement a system-wide encryption policy.

SHA_CRYPT_MAX_ROUNDS.title: SV-258119: RHEL 9 shadow password suite must be configured to use a sufficient number of hashing rounds.

PASS_MAX_DAYS.title: SV-258041: RHEL 9 user account passwords for new users or password changes must have a 60-day maximum password lifetime restriction in /etc/login.defs.

FAIL_DELAY.title: SV-258071: RHEL 9 must enforce a delay of at least four seconds between logon prompts following a failed logon attempt.

UMASK.title: SV-258074: RHEL 9 must define default permissions for all authenticated users in such a way that the user can only read and modify their own files.

PASS_MIN_DAYS.title: SV-258104: RHEL 9 passwords for new users or password changes must have a 24 hours minimum password lifetime restriction in /etc/login.defs.

PASS_MIN_LEN.title: SV-258108: RHEL 9 passwords for new users must have a minimum of 15 characters.

atm.title: SV-257804: RHEL 9 must be configured to disable the Asynchronous Transfer Mode kernel module.

can.title: SV-257805: RHEL 9 must be configured to disable the Controller Area Network kernel module.

firewire_core.title: SV-257806: RHEL 9 must be configured to disable the FireWire kernel module.

sctp.title: SV-257807: RHEL 9 must disable the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) kernel module.

tipc.title: SV-257808: RHEL 9 must disable the Transparent Inter Process Communication (TIPC) kernel module.

/dev/shm-nodev.title: SV-257863: RHEL 9 must mount /dev/shm with the nodev option.

/dev/shm-noexec.title: SV-257864: RHEL 9 must mount /dev/shm with the noexec option.

/dev/shm-nosuid.title: SV-257865: RHEL 9 must mount /dev/shm with the nosuid option.

/tmp-nodev.title: SV-257866: RHEL 9 must mount /tmp with the nodev option.

/tmp-noexec.title: SV-257867: RHEL 9 must mount /tmp with the noexec option.

/tmp-suid.title: SV-257868: RHEL 9 must mount /tmp with the nosuid option.

nfs-utils.title: SV-257828: RHEL 9 must not have the nfs-utils package installed.

gssproxy.title: SV-257832: RHEL 9 must not have the gssproxy package installed.

tuned.title: SV-257834: RHEL 9 must not have the tuned package installed.

rng-tools.title: SV-257841: RHEL 9 must have the rng-tools package installed.

main.localpkg_gpgcheck.title: SV-257821: RHEL 9 must check the GPG signature of locally installed software packages before installation.

s-nail.title: SV-257842: RHEL 9 must have the s-nail package installed.

libreswan.title: SV-257954: RHEL 9 libreswan package must be installed.

EndpointSecurity.title: SV-257780: RHEL 9 must implement the Endpoint Security for Linux Threat Prevention tool.

usbguard.title: SV-258035: RHEL 9 must have the USBGuard package installed.

fapolicyd.title: Linux fapolicy module must be installed.

rsyslog-gnutls.title: SV-258141: RHEL 9 must have the packages required for encrypting offloaded audit logs installed.

monitored.title: SV-258144: All RHEL 9 remote access methods must be monitored.

deny.title: SV-258054: RHEL 9 must automatically lock an account when three unsuccessful logon attempts occur.

even_deny_root.title: SV-258055: RHEL 9 must automatically lock the root account until the root account is released by an administrator when three unsuccessful logon attempts occur during a 15-minute time period.

fail_interval.title: SV-258056: RHEL 9 must automatically lock an account when three unsuccessful logon attempts occur during a 15-minute time period.

unlock_time.title: SV-258057: RHEL 9 must maintain an account lock until the locked account is released by an administrator.

maxlogins.title: SV-258069: RHEL 9 must limit the number of concurrent sessions to ten for all accounts and/or account types.

audit.title: SV-258070: RHEL 9 must log username information when unsuccessful logon attempts occur.

dir.title: SV-258080: RHEL 9 must configure SELinux context type to allow the use of a nondefault faillock tally directory.

enforce_for_root.title: SV-258101: RHEL 9 must enforce password complexity rules for the root account.

lcredit.title: SV-258102: RHEL 9 must enforce password complexity by requiring that at least one lowercase character be used.

dcredit.title: SV-258103: RHEL 9 must enforce password complexity by requiring that at least one numeric character be used.

minlen.title: SV-258109: RHEL 9 must enforce password complexity by requiring that at least one special character be used.

dictcheck.title: SV-258110: RHEL 9 must prevent the use of dictionary words for passwords.

ucredit.title: SV-258111: RHEL 9 must enforce password complexity by requiring that at least one uppercase character be used.

difok.title: SV-258112: RHEL 9 must require the change of at least eight characters when passwords are changed.

maxclassrepeat.title: SV-258113: RHEL 9 must require the maximum number of repeating characters of the same character class be limited to four when passwords are changed.

maxrepeat.title: SV-258114: RHEL 9 must require the maximum number of repeating characters be limited to three when passwords are changed.

minclass.title: SV-258115: RHEL 9 must require the change of at least four character classes when passwords are changed.

CLI_Login_Banner.title: SV-257779: RHEL 9 must display the Standard Mandatory DOD Notice and Consent Banner before granting local or remote access to the system via a command line user logon
CLI_Login_Banner.content:
You are accessing a U.S. Government (USG) Information System (IS) that is provided for USG-authorized use only.

By using this IS (which includes any device attached to this IS), you consent to the following conditions:

-The USG routinely intercepts and monitors communications on this IS for purposes including, but not limited to, penetration testing, COMSEC monitoring, network operations and defense, personnel misconduct (PM), law enforcement (LE), and counterintelligence (CI) investigations.

-At any time, the USG may inspect and seize data stored on this IS.

-Communications using, or data stored on, this IS are not private, are subject to routine monitoring, interception, and search, and may be disclosed or used for any USG-authorized purpose.

-This IS includes security measures (e.g., authentication and access controls) to protect USG interests -- not for your personal benefit or privacy.

-Notwithstanding the above, using this IS does not constitute consent to PM, LE or CI investigative searching or monitoring of the content of privileged communications, or work product, related to personal representation or services by attorneys, psychotherapists, or clergy, and their assistants. Such communications and work product are private and confidential. See User Agreement for details."

Banner.title: SV-257981: RHEL 9 must display the Standard Mandatory DOD Notice and Consent Banner before granting local or remote access to the system via a SSH logon.

LogLevel.title: SV-257982: RHEL 9 must log SSH connection attempts and failures to the server.

PubkeyAuthentication.title: SV-257983: RHEL 9 SSHD must accept public key authentication.

PermitEmptyPasswords.title: SV-257984: RHEL 9 SSHD must not allow blank passwords.

PermitRootLogin.title: SV-257985: RHEL 9 must not permit direct logons to the root account using remote access via SSH

HostBasedAuthentication.title: SV-257992: RHEL 9 must not allow a noncertificate trusted host SSH logon to the system.

PermitUserEnvironment.title: SV-257993: RHEL 9 must not allow users to override SSH environment variables.

RekeyLimit.title: SV-257994: RHEL 9 must force a frequent session key renegotiation for SSH connections to the server.

ClientAliveCountMax.title: SV-257995: RHEL 9 must be configured so that all network connections associated with SSH traffic terminate after becoming unresponsive.

UsePAM.title: SV-257986: RHEL 9 must enable the Pluggable Authentication Module (PAM) interface for SSHD

Compression.title: SV-258002: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must not allow compression or must only allow compression after successful authentication.

GSSAPIAuthentication.title: SV-258003: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must not allow GSSAPI authentication.

KerberosAuthentication.title: SV-258004: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must not allow Kerberos authentication.

IgnoreRhosts.title: SV-258005: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must not allow rhosts authentication.

IgnoreUserKnownHosts.title: SV-258006: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must not allow known hosts authentication.

X11Forwarding.title: SV-258007: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must disable remote X connections for interactive users.

StrictModes.title: SV-258008: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.

PrintLastLog.title: SV-258009: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must display the date and time of the last successful account logon upon an SSH logon.

UsePrivilegeSeparation.title: SV-258010: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must be configured to use privilege separation.

X11UseLocalhost.title: SV-258011: RHEL 9 SSH daemon must prevent remote hosts from connecting to the proxy display.

pki_authentication.title: SV-258132: RHEL 9 must map the authenticated identity to the user or group account for PKI-based authentication.

kernel.dmesg_restrict.title: SV-257797: RHEL 9 must restrict access to the kernel message buffer.

kernel.perf_event_paranoid.title: SV-257798: RHEL 9 must prevent kernel profiling by nonprivileged users.

kernel.kexec_load_disabled.title: SV-257799: RHEL 9 must prevent the loading of a new kernel for later execution.

kernel.kptr_restrict.title: SV-257800: RHEL 9 must restrict exposed kernel pointer addresses access.

fs.protected_hardlinks.title: SV-257801: RHEL 9 must enable kernel parameters to enforce discretionary access control on hardlinks.

fs.protected_symlinks.title: SV-257802: RHEL 9 must enable kernel parameters to enforce discretionary access control on symlinks.

kernel.core_pattern.title: SV-257803: RHEL 9 must disable the kernel.core_pattern.

kernel.randomize_va_space.title: SV-257809: RHEL 9 must implement address space layout randomization (ASLR) to protect its memory from unauthorized code execution.

kernel.unprivileged_bpf_disabled.title: SV-257810: RHEL 9 must disable access to network bpf system call from nonprivileged processes.

kernel.yama.ptrace_scope.title: SV-257811: RHEL 9 must restrict usage of ptrace to descendant processes.

user.max_user_namespaces.title: SV-257816: RHEL 9 must disable the use of user namespaces.

net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter.title: SV-257962: RHEL 9 must use reverse path filtering on all IPv4 interfaces.

net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects.title: SV-257963: RHEL 9 must prevent IPv4 Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) redirect messages from being accepted.

net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts.title: SV-257966: RHEL 9 must not respond to Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echoes sent to a broadcast address.

net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_respons.title: SV-257967: RHEL 9 must limit the number of bogus Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) response errors logs.

net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects.title: SV-257968: RHEL 9 must not send Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) redirects.

net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects.title: SV-257969: RHEL 9 must not allow interfaces to perform Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) redirects by default.

net.ipv4.conf.all.forwarding.title: SV-257970: RHEL 9 must not enable IPv4 packet forwarding unless the system is a router.

net.ipv6.conf.all.accept_ra.title: SV-257971: RHEL 9 must not accept router advertisements on all IPv6 interfaces.

net.ipv6.conf.all.accept_redirects.title: SV-257972: RHEL 9 must ignore IPv6 Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) redirect messages.

net.ipv6.conf.all.accept_source_route.title: SV-257973: RHEL 9 must not forward IPv6 source-routed packets.

net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding.title: SV-257974: RHEL 9 must not enable IPv6 packet forwarding unless the system is a router.

net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_ra.title: SV-257975: RHEL 9 must not accept router advertisements on all IPv6 interfaces by default.

net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_redirects.title: SV-257976: RHEL 9 must prevent IPv6 Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) redirect messages from being accepted.

net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_source_rout.title: SV-257977: RHEL 9 must not forward IPv6 source-routed packets by default.

Manager.CtrlAltDelBurstAction.title: SV-257784: The systemd Ctrl-Alt-Delete burst key sequence in RHEL 9 must be disabled.

Coredump.ProcessSizeMax.title: SV-257812: RHEL 9 must disable core dump backtraces.

Coredump.Storage.title: SV-257813: RHEL 9 must disable storing core dumps.

ctrl-alt-del.target.title: SV-257785:The x86 Ctrl-Alt-Delete key sequence must be disabled on RHEL 9.

debug-shell.service.title: SV-257786: RHEL 9 debug-shell systemd service must be disabled.

systemd-coredump.socket.title: SV-257815: RHEL 9 must disable acquiring, saving, and processing core dumps.

kdump.title: SV-TEST: The kdump service on Linux must be disabled.

vulnerability.mds: Vulnerable: Clear CPU buffers attempted, no microcode; SMT Host state unknown
vulnerability.mmio_stale_data: Vulnerable: Clear CPU buffers attempted, no microcode; SMT Host state unknown
vulnerability.spectre_v1: Mitigation; usercopy/swapgs barriers and __user pointer sanitization
vulnerability.spectre_v2: Mitigation; Retpolines; STIBP disabled; RSB filling; PBRSB-eIBRS Not affected; BHI Retpoline
